text:
No matter what I try, my CGI scripts (that have worked well with Apache 1.3)
appear in the browser as text when using Apache 2.0!
I've read the documentation about the required settings and they look OK to me.
I've queried your bug database, but found nothing of use for me there.
(Hopefully I've included my httpd.conf file (for upload)).
creator: pamajoff@yahoo.com
slive@apache.org
text:
Please ask on a user support forum such as
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

Your problem is almost certainly a configuration error and not a bug.  And even 
if it is a bug, your problem report does not give sufficient information to 
identify or fix it.  The user support forum can help you in either case.

Thanks.
